articles.title: Gujarat has started preparations for COVID-19 vaccination: CM - ANI News
articles.description: Rajkot (Gujarat) [India], December 6 (ANI): Gujarat has started preparations for the COVID-19 vaccination, which would start with around 3.96 lakh healthcare workers, Chief Minister Vijay Rupani said on Saturday.
